amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases funding for Operations and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $2 million in order to direct funds to the Commission to assess the threat to the U.S. from electromagnetic pulse attack.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to first reduce and then increase funding for Operations and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Franks (AZ).
